title: Fragments, 17th century
medium:
Medium: silk
Technique: cut and uncut supplementary warp pile (velvet)
dimensions:
a) Warp x Weft: 142 x 54 cm (55 7/8 x 21 1/4 in.)
b) Warp x Weft: 202 x 40 cm (6 ft. 7 1/2 in. x 15 3/4 in.)
description: Two long panels of velvet, cut and uncut, showing a horizontal pattern of a vase with flowers, a stylized crown and confronted birds, in dark red on a yellow ground.

Fragments, 17th century.Medium: silk
